title: Riot, I'm sick of this message.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/95b26f133c81d8c8a3711cc6fc8d8043.png

It appears after each game and it's just another click of hundreds to hit the end game screen. I've seen it once, I don't need to see it 100 more times.

replies.body: Funny I've NEVER gotten that message before, but every single time I login I get that stupid message about emote.
yeah good for you, I fucking get both of them constantly {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
Yea I got that one on my Macbook Pro running OSX High Sierra. Mind you it also shows after every game crash also. On my PC running Windows 10 however, I have never had it popup more than once.
I keep getting the "Emotes are here!" One, its really annoying especially after I have purchased multiple emotes
I can't close the message fo some reason so I have to force quit and relog into my client after every game... very annoying.
